item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="07760 06440">turn</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> and <st data-num="05012" class="">prophesy</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> them.

Say, ‘Mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Sovereign Lord! This is what the Sovereign Lord says to the mountains and the hills, to the ravines and the valleys: I am bringing a sword against you, and I will destroy your high places.

Your <st data-num="04196" class="">altars</st> will <st data-num="08074" class="">be ruined</st> and your <st data-num="02553" class="">incense altars</st> will be <st data-num="07665" class="">broken</st>. I will <st data-num="05307" class="">throw down</st> your <st data-num="02491" class="">slain</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> your <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">place</st> the <st data-num="06297" class="">corpses</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> their <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>,<n id="1" /> and I will <st data-num="02219" class="">scatter</st> your <st data-num="06106" class="">bones</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> your <st data-num="04196" class="">altars</st>.

In <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="04186" class="">dwellings</st>, the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> will <st data-num="02717 03456">be</st> <st data-num="02717" class="">laid waste</st> and the <st data-num="01116" class="">high places</st> <st data-num="03456" class="">ruined</st> <st data-num="04616" class="">so that</st> your <st data-num="04196" class="">altars</st> will <st data-num="02717 0816">be</st> <st data-num="02717" class="">laid waste</st> and <st data-num="0816" class="">ruined</st>, your <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st> will be <st data-num="07665" class="">shattered</st> and <st data-num="07673" class="">demolished</st>, your <st data-num="02553" class="">incense altars</st> will be <st data-num="01438" class="">broken down</st>, and your <st data-num="04639" class="">works</st> <st data-num="04229" class="">wiped out</st>.<n id="1" />
The slain will fall among you and then you will know that I am the Lord.
“‘But I will spare some of you. Some will escape the sword when you are scattered in foreign lands.

Then your <st data-num="06412" class="">survivors</st> will <st data-num="02142" class="">remember</st> me among the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> they are <st data-num="07617" class="">exiled</st>. They will realize<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">how</st> I was <st data-num="07665" class="">crushed</st> by their <st data-num="02181" class="">unfaithful</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> me and <st data-num="0854" class="">by</st> their <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st> that <st data-num="02181" class="">lusted</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> their <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>. They will <st data-num="06962" class="">loathe</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">themselves</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="07451 0834">evil</st> they have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> and because of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable practices</st>.
They will know that I am the Lord; my threats to bring this catastrophe on them were not empty.

“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Clap your hands, stamp your feet, and say, “Ah!” because of all the evil, abominable practices of the house of Israel, for they will fall by the sword, famine, and pestilence.

The one <st data-num="07350" class="">far away</st> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> by <st data-num="01698" class="">pestilence</st>, the one <st data-num="07138" class="">close by</st> will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>, and whoever <st data-num="07604" class="">is left</st> and has <st data-num="05341" class="">escaped</st> these<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> by <st data-num="07458" class="">famine</st>. I will <st data-num="03615" class="">fully vent</st> my <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st> against them.

Then you will know that I am the Lord when their dead lie among their idols around their altars, on every high hill and on all the mountaintops, under every green tree and every leafy oak—the places where they have offered fragrant incense to all their idols.
I will stretch out my hand against them and make the land a desolate waste from the wilderness to Riblah, in all the places where they live. Then they will know that I am the Lord.’”
